016package edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.service;
017
018import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
019import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
020import androidx.room.Database;
021import androidx.room.RoomDatabase;
022import androidx.room.TypeConverter;
023import androidx.room.TypeConverters;
024import androidx.sqlite.db.SupportSQLiteDatabase;
025import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.dao.LocationDao;
026import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.dao.UserDao;
027import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.entity.Location;
028import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.entity.User;
029import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.service.LeaveMeAloneDatabase.Converters;
030import java.time.Instant;
031
032/**
033 * Defines a connection to a local Room/SQLite database, All database reads/writes are performed
034 * using data-access object (DAO) instances obtained from the singleton instance of this class.
035 */
036@Database(
037    entities = {User.class, Location.class},
038    version = 1
039)
040@TypeConverters({Converters.class})
041public abstract class LeaveMeAloneDatabase extends RoomDatabase {
042
043  /**  Name of SQLite database file. */
044  public static final String NAME = "locations";
045
046  LeaveMeAloneDatabase() {
047    // Package-private constructor to avoid automatic HTML generation for Javadocs.
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * Returns an instance of a {@link UserDao} implementation, providing persistence operations on
052   * instances of the {@link User} entity class.
053   */
054  public abstract UserDao getUserDao();
055  public abstract LocationDao getLocationDao();
056
057  // TODO Declare abstract accessors (aka getters) for other DAOs used in this project.
058
059  /**
060   * Defines converters for otherwise unsupported types (initially, just {@link Instant}) to one of
061   * those supported by Room/SQLite.
062   */
063  public static class Converters {
064
065    /**
066     * Returns the specified {@link Instant} {@code value} as a {@link Long}, corresponding to the
067     * number of milliseconds elapsed since {@code 1970-01-01 00:00:00+00:00} encapsulated within
068     * {@code value}. When {@code value} is {@code null}, this method returns {@code null} as well.
069     *
070     * @param value Input {@link Instant}
071     * @return Epoch milliseconds encapsulated in {@code value}.
072     */
073    @TypeConverter
074    @Nullable
075    public static Long toLong(@Nullable Instant value) {
076      return (value != null) ? value.toEpochMilli() : null;
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * Returns an {@link Instant} instance containing the specified {@link Long} {@code value} epoch
081     * milliseconds. That is, {@code value} is interpreted as a number of milliseconds elapsed since
082     * {@code 1970-01-01 00:00:00+00:00}, and the corresponding {@link Instant} is returned. When
083     * {@code value} is {@code null}, this method returns {@code null} as well.
084     *
085     * @param value Epoch milliseconds.
086     * @return {@link Instant} corresponding to {@code value}.
087     */
088    @TypeConverter
089    @Nullable
090    public static Instant toInstant(@Nullable Long value) {
091      return (value != null) ? Instant.ofEpochMilli(value) : null;
092    }
093
094  }
095
096  /**
097   * Implements methods to be invoked on key database events.
098   */
099  public static class Callback extends RoomDatabase.Callback {
100
101    @Override
102    public void onCreate(@NonNull SupportSQLiteDatabase db) {
103      super.onCreate(db);
104      // TODO Obtain DAO instances from database, and use them to perform any required preloads, e.g.
105      //  LocalDatabase database = LocalDatabase.getInstance();
106      //  etc.
107    }
108
109  }
110
111}
